description: Offering air-conditioned accommodation, Ben Akiba Luxury Suites is located in the centre of Belgrade, 100 metres from Trg Republike Belgrade. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

name: Belgrade Lux
description: Located in the centre of Belgrade, about 700 metres from the Republic Square, Feel Belgrade Luxury Apartments offers modernly furnished accommodation with free WiFi access.

name: Central
description: Located in the centre of Belgrade, Central Park Apartments are set just a 3-minute walk from the Kalamegdan Fortress. The Knez Mihajlova Promenade can be reached in just 2 minutes on foot.

description: Located in Belgrade in the Central Serbia region, Central Business Apartments Jacuzzi provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub.

description: Set within 1.1 km of Republic Square Belgrade and 2.3 km of Splavovi in the centre of Belgrade, Panorama Central Apartments offers accommodation with seating area.

name: Airport
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Airport Apartments is located in Belgrade, 6 km from Belgrade Arena.

description: Clean&Cozy Apartments Novi Beograd has city views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Belgrade, 2.1 km from Belgrade Arena.

name: ZigZag

name: Chess
